name: OWL (ryc123)
description:
OWL is a walking simulator through a calming forest. 

Stable build for Windows coming soon...

HTML Gameplay:

Click the blue fullscreen button at the lower right of the executable to see all of the UI.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move.

M to return to the main menu.

Use the mouse to look around.

Developers:

Ryan Chou and Chloe Chou
